channel.title: Comments on: 100 Things We Didn’t Know Last Year
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Fortunately for me, I'm only interested in a few areas. Unfortunately, these few areas are evolving faster than I can handle.
item.content:encoded: Fortunately for me, I’m only interested in a few areas. Unfortunately, these few areas are evolving faster than I can handle.

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: nice. glad to see that there is a lot I don't know. it feels as if i need a long life to study it all
item.content:encoded: nice. glad to see that there is a lot I don’t know. it feels as if i need a long life to study it all
